task: Cooking Rice with Hamilton Beach Multi-Cooker

steps.details: Measure the desired amount of rice using a measuring cup.
Pour the rice into the cooking pot of the Hamilton Beach multi-cooker.
Add the appropriate amount of water according to the rice variety. A general guideline is 1:1.5 for white rice and 1:2 for brown rice (rice to water ratio).
Press the start button to begin the cooking cycle. The cooker will automatically adjust the time and temperature.
